metadata.dc:author: Hayes, O
Berlanga, J
Pilar Rodríguez, M
de la Fuente, J
metadata.dc:description: Viral sequences of the cerebrospinal fluid were amplified by using oligonucleotides that are homologous to region 5' of the Enteroviruses. The results showed a great variability in the amplified sequences, suggesting the presence of enteroviral quasispecies with altered biological properties in the stressed individuals that may play an important role in the neurological damage.
metadata.dc:title: Etiología nutro-viral de la neuropatía epidémica. Grupo para el estudio de la neuropatía epidémica.
[The nutritional-viral etiology of epidemic neuropathy. The Group for the Study of Epidemic Neuropathy].
